originalTitle: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
title: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
content: Abena Christine Jon'el left the US and now aims to raise the profile of people with disabilities in Ghana.

originalTitle: Ex-Nigeria oil minister in bribery trial spent £2m at Harrods, court hears
title: Ex-Nigeria oil minister in bribery trial spent £2m at Harrods, court hears
content: Diezani Alison-Madueke is accused of accepting bribes from industry figures interested in Nigerian government contracts, a court in London has heard.

originalTitle: Rwanda seeks £100m from UK over axed asylum deal
title: Rwanda seeks £100m from UK over axed asylum deal
content: The African nation argues it is owed payments but the Home Office says it will fight the case.

originalTitle: Israeli plans for Rafah ‘camp’ in Gaza slammed as continuation of genocide
title: Israeli plans for Rafah ‘camp’ in Gaza slammed as continuation of genocide
content: An Israeli 'organised camp' in Rafah would use facial recognition as a 'sorting' tool to deter return, analyst warns.

originalTitle: Video: Mozambique floods force thousands into displacement camps
title: Video: Mozambique floods force thousands into displacement camps
content: Flooding in southern Mozambique has forced thousands of families to flee to informal displacement camps.

originalTitle: Sudan’s war displaced crisis peaks as millions eye return to ruined homes
title: Sudan’s war displaced crisis peaks as millions eye return to ruined homes
content: Sudan hosts 14 million displaced people, but a fragile trend of return to Khartoum is emerging, despite ruins.

originalTitle: Trump says government will 'de-escalate' in Minnesota following Pretti shooting
title: Trump says government will 'de-escalate' in Minnesota following Pretti shooting
content: The killing of Alex Pretti over the weekend led Minnesota officials and locals to renew calls for Trump to end his immigration operation there.

originalTitle: 'I don't let bullies win,' says US congresswoman Omar after substance thrown at her
title: 'I don't let bullies win,' says US congresswoman Omar after substance thrown at her
content: The Minnesota Democrat was uninjured and continued to speak at her event, after being sprayed with an unidentified liquid.

originalTitle: Amazon confirms 16,000 job cuts after accidental email
title: Amazon confirms 16,000 job cuts after accidental email
content: The technology giant confirmed the redundancies hours after it told staff in an email sent in error.

content: With the league phase of the Champions League almost over, which teams can join Arsenal and Bayern Munich in the top eight?

originalTitle: West Ham sign winger Traore from Fulham
title: West Ham sign winger Traore from Fulham
content: West Ham sign winger Adama Traore from Fulham on a permanent basis for an undisclosed fee.

originalTitle: Ward-Prowse set for West Ham departure after not playing under Nuno
title: James Ward-Prowse: A Big Change for a Football Star!
content:
Hello, Future Football Stars!

Jambo, my amazing friends! It's your kid-friendly reporter from Africa here, bringing you some exciting news from the big world of football! You know, that game where everyone chases a ball and tries to score goals? It's played all over the world, even right here in our villages and towns! Today, we're going to talk about a football player named James Ward-Prowse. He's a very good player, and something new is happening for him! It's like when you get to try a new game or go to a new school. Very exciting! We will learn all about his big adventure, so let's get started!

Who is James Ward-Prowse?

So, who is James Ward-Prowse? He is a football player! He loves to kick the ball and run on the green grass field. He used to play for a team called West Ham. Imagine your favourite group of friends who play football together – that's like a team! James played many, many games with his West Ham friends. He is known for being super good at kicking the ball from far away, especially when the game stops and he gets to take a special kick. He has a very strong and accurate leg! Many people enjoy watching him play because he is so talented.

What is a Midfielder?

James Ward-Prowse plays a special job on the football field called a "midfielder." Do you know what a midfielder does? Imagine the football field is like a very long room. The defenders stay near your goal to stop the other team from scoring. The attackers stay near the other team's goal to try and score. A midfielder, like James, runs all over the middle! They help the defenders, and they help the attackers. They are super important because they link everyone together. They pass the ball, they steal the ball from the other team, and they make sure the team works like one big family. They are like the heart of the team!

Why Do Players Move Teams?

Sometimes, players move from one team to another. Why do they do that? Well, just like you might want to try a new game if your old game isn't so fun anymore, players sometimes want to play more! James Ward-Prowse wasn't playing as much as he wanted to at West Ham lately. A coach named Nuno was in charge, and sometimes coaches pick different players for games. So, James wanted to find a new team where he could play more games and run more on the field. It’s a chance for him to show off his amazing skills again and have more fun playing the sport he loves!

What is a "Loan Move"?

The news says James is making a "loan move." What does that mean? It's a bit like borrowing something from a friend. Imagine your friend has a fantastic toy car, but they are not playing with it right now. So, they let you borrow it for a little while to play with. You get to have fun with the car, and your friend still owns it. A loan move in football is like that! James Ward-Prowse will play for a new team, Burnley, for a short time. He will help them win games. But after some time, he will still belong to West Ham. It’s a way for players to play games and help other teams for a bit, and then go back to their original team.

A Doctor's Visit for Footballers!

Before James can officially join his new team, Burnley, he has to do something called a "medical." What is a medical? It's like going to the doctor for a check-up! The doctors will look at James to make sure his body is strong and healthy. They will check his legs, his heart, and everything to make sure he can run super fast and kick the ball super hard without getting hurt. All players need to be very healthy to play football well. It's important to make sure he is ready for all the running, jumping, and kicking that happens in a game! Being healthy is super important for everyone.

Hello, Burnley! A New Adventure!

So, James Ward-Prowse is going to play for a team called Burnley! This is a brand-new adventure for him. He will meet new teammates, wear a new team jersey, and play in new stadiums. It's always exciting to start something new, isn't it? He will try his best to score goals and help Burnley win many matches. We wish James all the best on his new journey! Maybe he will score lots of fantastic goals for Burnley. It's like moving to a new village and making new friends, full of new discoveries and new chances to shine! We hope he has a lot of fun.

Did You Know? Fun Football Facts!

* **Did you know?** Football is the most popular sport in the whole world! More people watch and play football than any other game! It brings so many people together. * **Did you know?** A football match lasts for 90 minutes, but it's split into two halves of 45 minutes each. That's a lot of running and playing! * **Did you know?** The World Cup, which is the biggest football tournament, happens every four years! Teams from all countries play to see who is the best! Maybe your country will play one day! * **Did you know?** Many famous African footballers have played for big teams in Europe, showing their amazing talent to the world! We are so proud of them and their skills!

Playing Like a Team!

No matter which team James plays for, or which team you cheer for, football is all about teamwork! When players work together, pass the ball, and help each other, they become super strong. Just like when you play with your friends, it’s always better when you work together. Everyone has a part to play, whether you are a defender, a midfielder, or an attacker. Helping each other is the best way to win and have fun! Teamwork makes the dream work, always!

Keep Dreaming Big!

So, that's the exciting news about James Ward-Prowse! From all of us here in Africa, we send him good wishes for his new start. We hope he has a wonderful time playing for Burnley. And for all you amazing kids watching and playing football, keep dreaming big! Maybe one day, you will be the next big football star, running on those green fields, scoring goals, and making your team and your country proud! Remember to play fair, work hard, and always have fun! Jambo, until next time!
summary: James Ward-Prowse, a football player, is moving from one team, West Ham, to another team called Burnley for a little while, after not playing much with his old team.
whyMatters: It's important because players sometimes need to find new teams where they can play more games and show their amazing skills, just like when you try a new game to have more fun and learn new things.
